    • Method Detail

      • getLocations

        public List<de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Location> getLocations()
        Gives all locations, which are stored in the database.
        Address: POST [server]/resources/location
        Returns:
        List of Locations

      • getLocation

        public de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Location getLocation(Integer locationId)
        Gives the location, which belongs to the given id.
        Address: POST [server]/resources/location[location_id]
        Parameters:
        locationId - id of the location
        Returns:
        Location with the given id

      • createLocation

        public de.fhg.fokus.persistence.Location createLocation(String sid,
                                               String location)
        Create a new location object. It only stores locations which have minimum 3 letters.
        Address: POST [server]/resources/location?sid=test_user&location=[location_name]
        Parameters:
        sid - valid session id
        location - name of location
        Returns:
        new location object
